svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 23, 2024" date: "2024-11-22"
‚Ä¢ Client testing call #13 : pectra-devnet-4 not finalizing, plan to deprecate next week and
pectra-devnet-5 spec discussion, PeerDAS & EOF will rebase once spec released Reminder: Mekong testnet
live, app/wallet devs & stakers can test Pectra upgrade
Client testing call #13 : pectra-devnet-4 not finalizing, plan to deprecate next week and
pectra-devnet-5 spec discussion, PeerDAS & EOF will rebase once spec released
‚Ä¢ Toni Wahrst√§tter: blob fee market , proposal to increase blob count & reduce execution layer payload
size via EIP7623 (increase calldata cost) and analysis of other potential changes
Toni Wahrst√§tter: blob fee market , proposal to increase blob count & reduce execution layer payload
‚Ä¢ EIP4444 (history expiry) implementation plan : pre-merge data expiry planned for May 1 using Portal
EIP4444 (history expiry) implementation plan : pre-merge data expiry planned for May 1 using Portal
‚Ä¢ Anders Elowsson: issuance reward curve , could reduce to a new curve over 1-2 years
Anders Elowsson: issuance reward curve , could reduce to a new curve over 1-2 years
‚Ä¢ EIP7732 ePBS: ePBS breakout #13 : discussed withdrawals when building on empty blocks and how
staking pool operators can become builders Potuz: case for ePBS in Fusaka upgrade
‚Ä¢ ePBS breakout #13 : discussed withdrawals when building on empty blocks and how staking pool
ePBS breakout #13 : discussed withdrawals when building on empty blocks and how staking pool operators
‚Ä¢ Potuz: case for ePBS in Fusaka upgrade
Potuz: case for ePBS in Fusaka upgrade
‚Ä¢ Metaclear : transport-level privacy leaks at validator-relay interfaces
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 28% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 28% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate
based on 74% self reported data) Consensus layer: Prysm 35% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
‚Ä¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth: v1.14.12 : changes in tracing & signing, database optimizations, RISC-V
docker images and removes personal RPC namespace & unlock flag Reth v1.1.2 : payload fetching
improvements, bug fixes and OP Stack Holocene upgrade support
‚Ä¢ Geth: v1.14.12 : changes in tracing & signing, database optimizations, RISC-V docker images and
removes personal RPC namespace & unlock flag
Geth: v1.14.12 : changes in tracing & signing, database optimizations, RISC-V docker images and
‚Ä¢ Reth v1.1.2 : payload fetching improvements, bug fixes and OP Stack Holocene upgrade support
Reth v1.1.2 : payload fetching improvements, bug fixes and OP Stack Holocene upgrade support
‚Ä¢ L2Beat user operations per second (UOPS) added to activity dashboard
‚Ä¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7819 : Create delegate EIP7822 : EVM modular arithmetic
extensions EIP7823 : Set upper bounds for MODEXP
‚Ä¢ EIP7823 : Set upper bounds for MODEXP
EIP7823 : Set upper bounds for MODEXP
‚Ä¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7820 : Access control registry ERC7821 : Minimal batch executor
interface ERC7824 : State channels with account abstraction
‚Ä¢ ERC7824 : State channels with account abstraction
ERC7824 : State channels with account abstraction
‚Ä¢ Reminder: Devcon faucet , claim testnet ETH for Mekong, Sepolia & Hole≈°ky using Zupass
Reminder: Devcon faucet , claim testnet ETH for Mekong, Sepolia & Hole≈°ky using Zupass
‚Ä¢ Trail of Bits: AI Solidity code completion evaluated , best commercial: Claude 3 Opus & best local:
Trail of Bits: AI Solidity code completion evaluated , best commercial: Claude 3 Opus & best local:
‚Ä¢ Prolog on Ethereum : prototype integrated with revm alongside R55
Prolog on Ethereum : prototype integrated with revm alongside R55
‚Ä¢ Solchip8 : CHIP-8 (interpreted language from 70‚Äôs 8-bit microcomputers) emulator contract
Solchip8 : CHIP-8 (interpreted language from 70‚Äôs 8-bit microcomputers) emulator contract
‚Ä¢ Devcon CTFs: Immunefi ETH Escape : challenges open to all for 2 weeks BuidlGuidl CTF game : 12
‚Ä¢ Immunefi ETH Escape : challenges open to all for 2 weeks
Immunefi ETH Escape : challenges open to all for 2 weeks
‚Ä¢ EF internships 2025 : 12 weeks, research or software engineering, apply by December 9
EF internships 2025 : 12 weeks, research or software engineering, apply by December 9
‚Ä¢ McDonald‚Äôs McCaf√© Doodles holiday cups in US
‚Ä¢ Nethermind: Auditor , Agent Engineer , Content Marketing Manager & Researcher
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
‚Ä¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 5.9 to 48.0 gwei, 13.0 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3
gwei 8.4k ETH net issuance this week
‚Ä¢ Gas: 5.9 to 48.0 gwei, 13.0 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
Gas: 5.9 to 48.0 gwei, 13.0 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
‚Ä¢ Alex Pertsev remains in pre-trial detention
Alex Pertsev remains in pre-trial detention
‚Ä¢ SEC‚Äôs dealer rule struck down by District court as SEC exceeded statutory authority
SEC‚Äôs dealer rule struck down by District court as SEC exceeded statutory authority
‚Ä¢ SEC Chair Gary Gensler stepping down January 20
SEC Chair Gary Gensler stepping down January 20
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄùDutch‚Äù sentenced to 5 years & ‚ÄúRazzlekhan‚Äù to 18 months for laundering BTC from Bitfinex 2016 hack
‚ÄùDutch‚Äù sentenced to 5 years & ‚ÄúRazzlekhan‚Äù to 18 months for laundering BTC from Bitfinex 2016 hack
‚Ä¢ 21Shares adds ETH staking ETP in EU
21Shares adds ETH staking ETP in EU
‚Ä¢ NIST deprecating ECDSA after 2030 & disallowing use after 2035
NIST deprecating ECDSA after 2030 & disallowing use after 2035
‚Ä¢ Justin Thaler: Jolt roadmap to formally verified implementation
Justin Thaler: Jolt roadmap to formally verified implementation
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
‚Ä¢ May 30 - Jun 4 ‚Äì ETH Belgrade hackathon & conference
